overview: Prior to joining Screenreach, David served as a Director at Obscura Digital, known as one of the most innovative creative agencies and technology labs in the world. David’s passion for digital signage and emerging technology’s role in enhancing the customer experience is well illustrated in his highly regarded blog, Digital Signage Insights. David’s experience includes consulting to Fortune 100 technology companies, developing next-generation technology solutions for global consumer brands, and advising a diverse range of startups. As a digital strategist and technology specialist, David’s background extends to the fields of digital out-of-home media, mobile, social media, and emerging Web applications. David is a frequent speaker at industry events and conferences on the topic of mobile, social, and DOOH convergence.
